About

Hi! my name is Luiz Felipe, and I'm called Felixn in the programming world. I am a Front-end web developer, but I've explored other segments of this world as well, such as mobile apps and game development (my favorite). My main focus today is on Front-end development. I've been only working on individual projects so far, just so I can start to comprehend what is necessary and start working on real projects. But of course, if you're reading this text in this website that I've created, it means I've put myself available and I feel ready to start a journey in this path.

Services

INTERFACE

The Interface is a very important part of a website because it's meant to give the user a fast viusal answer to what they are looking for. It can be simple, captivating (if you're looking for more complex animations), but its main purpose is to make the user's experience easier.

RESPONSIVE

Websites need to work in every screen size if you want to maximize the amount of people that will click on it. Responsive approach in Front-end development is a must and needs to have the appropriate attention. This way, the experience will be customized according to the size of the user's screen, giving it a "mobile app" interface while on a phone, and displaying its full contents in a bigger screen.

CROSS-BROWSER

Browsers work differently, and as such, some of them will demand different approaches in the development so that it can be read and understood by, if not all, the most popular browsers of the moment. I use a Google First approach, since its used by at least 2/3 of all internet users on Earth, but I won't forget about Firefox, Edge and Safari.
